name: Hoop Hop
description:
This is a casual score attack game  originally made for #LowRezJam

Controls

arrow keys, A D - move 

arrow up, w, space - jump

p - pause

r - restart

Esc - quit

Art, design, dev, etc all from me except the song which is from gamesfounder.com

After the Jam I will keep working on this game, adding characters, game modes and port it to mobile.


Listen to RealDudes podcast on Sonic Mania and Hoop Hop here
https://realdudespod.podbean.com/e/real-mini-sonic-mania-hoop-hop/?utm_content=b...
